instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1465: What is A1465? A1465 is a model number for a 11 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2924, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00164, 820-3208, 820-3435..
definitions.PP3V42_G3H: What is PP3V42_G3H? PP3V42_G3H is a power rail present when the machine is in a G3H global system hardware off state and is the first rail that should be generated in Macbooks that use it. .
definitions.820-3208: What is 820-3208? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.R6905: What is R6905? Resistor between charger voltage and input to PP3V42_G3H power supply on older Macbooks, pre-2011 models. This resistor blows when C6990 has shorted to ground or U6990 has shorted to ground, and will result in PP3V42_G3H missing and the magsafe charger not having a light since PP3V42_G3H is necessary for the SMC to turn on and the onewire circuit to turn on..

threads.title: [SOLVED]<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1465</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Liquid damaged Low <SIGNAL>PP3V42_G3H</SIGNAL>
threads.message:
Hello

I have <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3208</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> come with liquid damage around SMC and SPI. After ultrasonic clean measure <SIGNAL>PP3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> 1.8V. Checked <CHIP>U6990</CHIP> no corrosion . <RESISTOR>R6995</RESISTOR> ,<RESISTOR>R6996</RESISTOR> checked fine, when i injected 3.42V <SIGNAL>PP3V42_G3H</SIGNAL> fan spin and dong noise ok. ( didnt checked screen yet)

Where around can i start?

threads.message: Thank you aprendiz your question solved problem:) Voltage is 1.4V and checked <RESISTOR>R6905</RESISTOR> and it must be 10ohm but 4.5Kohm shows replaced and everything is ok.
